key.name: active-sources
key.summary: List of lyrics sources to be scanned

key.name: scanning-order
key.summary: Sources are scanned in this order

key.name: show-first
key.description: Whether to automatically show the sidebar when playback starts

key.name: cache-lyrics
key.summary: Whether lyrics are saved or not
key.description: If set to True, lyrics are stored in 'lyrics-folder' (default is "~/.cache/rhythmbox/lyrics/"). Set to False to disable this (note that in this case, lyrics sources have to be rescanned everytime).

key.name: lyrics-folder
key.summary: Folder where fetched lyrics are saved
key.description: Default is "~/.cache/rhythmbox/lyrics/". Folder must exist, otherwise key is reset to default.

key.name: ignore-brackets
key.summary: Always ignore parentheses in song title
key.description: Whether to generally ignore parentheses in song title. Per default, only some specific strings are filtered.

key.name: left-sidebar
key.description: Whether to show lyrics in the left sidebar instead of the default right sidebar

key.name: hide-label
key.description: Whether to show or hide the sidebar label
